Reviews.Title: Unpleasant to see and sceptical to use
Reviews.Author: Cedric
Reviews.Content: I would like to say when buying Items like this I should have known better due to item been used. On receipt of the item I noticed that it was not mailed out in a box but rather an envelope made out of bubble wrap and the power supply (nothing else) in the large envelope. This item had dirt caked up between the keys and the ear peace was just dirty, come on clean the item before mailing.What kind of system is Amazon allowing, are they not rules to follow in mailing out items to customers.I will not attempt to buy another item like this using the Amazon team again.

Reviews.Title: Not in proper conditions, lack of accesories
Reviews.Author: Marcela
Reviews.Content: I received the BlackBerry in its package, lacking user instructions and CD for configuration.The vendor committed to send it by courrier but never arrived.When I took out screen protector, I found out that the screen was damaged in the corners.I assume that this product wasn't new.I communicated this problem to the vendor, but never received an answer in return.I DON'T RECOMMEND THIS VENDOR.

Reviews.Title: my first used bbcurve8520
Reviews.Author: kasha-j
Reviews.Content: the only thing i didnt like bout the packaging was the smell but other than that the phone is great oh after awhile the usb cable didnt work so i had to buy a new one. I am still using this phone and delivery was even earlier than expected.

Reviews.Title: fully satisfactory
Reviews.Author: kbdmom24
Reviews.Content: Problem-free order processing, phone works great here in the US with existing service plan, but was actually bought for use overseas. Traveling in 10 days, so I have yet to see how it works across the Atlantic!

Reviews.Title: International unlocked phone
Reviews.Author: Susan
Reviews.Content: Purchased a blackberry curve to use in Jamaica. It was brand new still in the original box and seal not broken. Item shipped promptly. Unlocked international no problem using in Jamaica. Very pleased with product. Easy to use. Would purchase from this seller again.

Reviews.Title: Blackberry curve 8520
Reviews.Author: JOJOZA
Reviews.Content: Excellent seller recommended 100%. It works perfectly in Venezuela with any operator of cellular telephony. fully released. tested Movilnet and Digitel. Good product comes in its box with all accessories and instructions manuals are in Spanish.

Reviews.Title: Very good customer experience
Reviews.Author: Monica
Reviews.Content: The product arrived as scheduled and in perfect conditions. Very good customer experience. I recomend the produt and the provider.

Reviews.Title: Wrong color!
Reviews.Author: Mili Galavis
Reviews.Content: I ordered a black cell phone from this seller and evething went well except that I received a white cell phone in a box saying that it contains a black one. I'm planning to keep it just because I need it and don't want to trouble myself with the return process.

Reviews.Title: WRONG COLOR
Reviews.Author: Lauren
Reviews.Content: My old phone broke so I needed a new one immediately. This product shipped overnight but for some reason was white even though the title clearly says black. I'm pissed.

Reviews.Title: Stopped working after a few months
Reviews.Author: Shilpz "SB"
Reviews.Content: I have always trusted Amazon with products. However, buying cell phones from this website was a mistake. I bought 2 of these blackberries to gift it to my aunt and uncle as a New Year Gift. The phones started giving us trouble shortly in a few months, and yesterday (which is about 6 months after purchase) my aunt told me that both the phones get disconnected in a few seconds of every call they receive. They finally had to leave the phones and switch to their old ones. Totally disappointed. Just cannot describe my frustration with this product. Sorry Amazon, you did not help me this time.

Reviews.Title: Blackberry Curve 9360
Reviews.Author: Malbin Jose martinez
Reviews.Content: el equipo es muy bueno llego a tiempo y rapido solo un poco tarde por que en la aduana dura mucho para la revision es rapido eficiente

Reviews.Title: Excelente producto y compañía muy seria.
Reviews.Author: Arturo Burbano
Reviews.Content: Excelente compañía. Llegó el día estimado según lo especificado: nuevo y desbloqueado. Con respecto al producto; es un Blackberry sencillo con lo básico, viene con pin propio y se configura de acuerdo al chip sym que se le instale. Muy buen producto, elegante y sencillo.

Reviews.Title: Works for Argentina
Reviews.Author: lucas
Reviews.Content: I've bought this BB to use in Argentina (Movistar Carrier). Even though it has the Vodaphone logo (at first I thought it was a used phone) the phone was completly unlocked. Worked just fine with the frequency that is used in Argentina (850, 900, 1800 1900 mhz) and has both edge/gprs connection, no 3G though (the phone specifies the lack of this type of connection, so I was ok with it). If you're planning to travel, and want to buy a phone to use in Argentina, this phone worked just fine.

Reviews.Title: awesome!
Reviews.Author: rachelm12
Reviews.Content: i am very pleased with this phone. i recieved it as a christmas gift from my parents and i couldn't be happier with its performance. it is new and in perfect condition and it works very well. it also came very fast and with free shipping. I love it and would definitely buy from this company again.

Reviews.Title: good product!
Reviews.Author: florencia
Reviews.Content: My phone works very well in Argentina, was new and came with all the accesories correct! no regrets! I think is better to buy a cellphone with warranty because you make sure you will receive a good product instead of a no warranty phone tha dont come correct. It's a good advice!

Reviews.Title: ENVIO EXTRAVIADO
Reviews.Author: MAU
Reviews.Content: EL ENVIO DEL TELEFONO BLACK BERRY COMPRADO,  NUNCA LLEGO A SU DESTINO, AUNQUE DECIA QUE HABIA LLEGADO..Y NO RESOLVIERON CON UPS EL PROBLEMA YA QUE EL PAQUETE NO FUE ENTREGADO REALMENTE COMO DECIA UPS

Reviews.Title: Usable Phone!
Reviews.Author: Intelligentguy
Reviews.Content: Not the best phone but usable..Bought this phone for a relative. Within the first six months of use he didn't report any issues to me and said everything was fine.

Reviews.Title: sham
Reviews.Author: maggiein
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a new phone and although it came in new package the phone was a refurbished one as the screw inside clearly show that they were tampered with. After 2 months I threw it away. A waste of money will just go into a store and purchase a no contract one.

Reviews.Title: BlackBerry Curve 8520 Unlocked Quad-Band Cell Phone with 2 MP Camera,...
Reviews.Author: Betty Liu
Reviews.Content: I like it because it is easy to use. The problem is that 2 or 3 letters are missing when I'am writing so I have to press a little harder.. And after I charge it sometimes it empty very fast for instant 2 hours and it become very hot.

Reviews.Title: VERY CHEAP QUALITY
Reviews.Author: NY
Reviews.Content: This phone did not last even for 3 months. The battery started bulging and the back side cover started coming out. The battery does not long for more than 4 hrs after it is fully charged. It is totally a crap product.Amazon should stop selling products from this seller fop cheating people with low quality products.

Reviews.Title: BlackBerry Curve 8520
Reviews.Author: Rosemary Armstrong
Reviews.Content: Problems with the camera, quality of phone calls not very good at times. Ok in a pinch but would opt to purchase something better at some point.

Reviews.Title: funciona en venezuela
Reviews.Author: Yenired lopez
Reviews.Content: the phone is released four bands works perfectly with any of the operators recommend calling to Venezuela arrived in perfect condition

Reviews.Title: muy bien
Reviews.Author: Nereida Luque
Reviews.Content: El proceso realizado sin ningun problema, la entrega fue realizada a plena satisfacción, durante el tiempo establecido, se recomienda el vendedor

Reviews.Title: FUE UN ESTAFA
Reviews.Author: ylianna teran
Reviews.Content: ESTE TELÉFONO ESTABA EN MUY MALAS CONDICIONES, NUNCA LE SIRVIÓ EL WIFI, NO LEE LAS TARJETA MULTIMEDIA ASÍ Q NUNCA PUDE ALMACENAR FOTOS NI VÍDEOS, LO MANDE A REPARAR VARIAS VECES PORQ SE LE DAÑÓ EL MOUSE Y CUANDO LO ABRÍAN ME DECÍAN Q POR DENTRO EL TELÉFONO ESTABA MUY DESTROZADO Q LA REPARACIÓN DURARÍA MUY POCO PORQ ERA UN BB VIEJO Y EN MALAS CONDICIONES ASÍ Q NO LOS RECOMIENDO!!! ME SENTÍ ESTAFADA PORQ NO ES ESO LO Q OFRECÍAN EN LA PUBLICACIÓN. ASÍ Q PERDÍ EL DINERO COMPRANDO ESE TELÉFONO.

Reviews.Title: esta bien
Reviews.Author: Elba francisco "kiminaya"
Reviews.Content: este telefono esta bien , aunque me lo enviaron de otro color y bueno por esa razon  no estube muy conforme

Reviews.Title: smartphone
Reviews.Author: mapache
Reviews.Content: rapido, liviano, combina el acceso a la web con las bondades de un telefono con varias aplicaciones:alarma, agenda, cronometro, mensajeria instantanea y por supuesto el pin

Reviews.Title: Bueno Totalmente
Reviews.Author: Alejandra
Reviews.Content: Llego en perfecto estado, estoy muy contenta y agradecia con la compra, recomendable totalmente, pesonas cumplidas y correctas con lo que envian.

Reviews.Title: Product was sold as new but was obviously refurbished!!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these phone on August 7 2012.  At first, they worked just fine, but recently they started acting up.  First,one of the track balls got stuck.  The other one suddenly would not come on.  I bought it to a technician and upon inspection it was realised that the phone was refurbished.  The seal on the screw had been broken and the screw place on the inside so as not to make it too obvious.This was obviously calculated and done with the intention to deceive.  I am seriously considering what from of redress i can persue!!

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Anthony
Reviews.Content: Blackberry 8520 is a G r e a t S m a r t p h o n e with a reasonable cost.

Reviews.Title: Blackberry Curve 8520
Reviews.Author: Cameron
Reviews.Content: Good Phone- very few issues. Better function than old trac-ball type. Good for texting. Daughter uses it & it has been very reliable.

Reviews.Title: muchos problemsas
Reviews.Author: lisbeth marcano manzano
Reviews.Content: Yo compre 2 telefonos, a los dos meses de uso a uno tuve que cambiarle la membrana, y luego el sensor porque se me dañaron, y a los 6 meses al otro telefono le tuve que cambiar la pantalla y la membrana tambien. No creo que ninguno de los dos hayan sido nuevos, estoy segura que eran repotenciados.

Reviews.Title: all right
Reviews.Author: Hernan
Reviews.Content: It is a great product. good packaging, good price,absolutely, I recommend it. . . . . . . . .

Reviews.Title: It stopped working
Reviews.Author: Stephanie Borgan
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my boyfriend, the center key stopped working and without it the phone is useless!Waste of money again!

Reviews.Title: disappointed, do not buy
Reviews.Author: lavern
Reviews.Content: Please do not buy this phone, we bought it as new, apparently it was not, once we activated the phone it started shutting off automatically, even in the middle of a conversation the phone would shut off.......please don't waste your money on this piece of junk

Reviews.Title: Blackberry Curve
Reviews.Author: Majesti
Reviews.Content: Excellent service thus far. As I passed through the malls, I enquired about the price of this product and to my surprise, it was always $200 and more. Thanks Amazon for giving me a good product at a reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: Received in one piece .. :D
Reviews.Author: vinayak
Reviews.Content: hey guys ..i just received my blackberry ..satisfied with the product ..It came with everything . cd, charger, battery ..all gud except ..the phone was in spanish by default !! :D .. i took time to figure out how to change that. But now its all gud .

Reviews.Title: Excelent
Reviews.Author: H. Perez
Reviews.Content: Excelent unlocked phone for the price. I could use my own phone company and so far I am very happy with my purchase. Also it was delivery faster that I expected

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: pietro
Reviews.Content: It is a very good item. And it have a good price. It's great to have it and is good item

Reviews.Title: Bona fide new unit, perfect condition
Reviews.Author: Doug Stevens
Reviews.Content: I decided to buy a unit that was shippped and sold by Amazon. The unit arrived much more quickly than expected. It was a bona fide new unit with every bit of packaging, peel-off protectors, slips of paper, connectors, and instructions that a new unit would have. It was in perfect condition and works perfectly. Shortcomings are inherent to the unit -- it's not a high end BlackBerry and I didn't pay a high-end price. Keys are stiffer, the unit doesn't have as solid a feel as top of the line models, and the interface of this older (2009) model is not as nice as newer models. The track pad is fine, not much different than on the current (2011) models. The purchase deserves 5 stars because Amazon shipped a genuine new unit, not one that is refurbished or missing documentation like so many other reviewers have experienced, and it works. I paid a bit extra for the one-year warranty, which is documented in the form of a card shipped in the box, to be on the safe side. It looks like I may not need it. But of course, you're much more likely to need a warranty when you don't have one.

Reviews.Title: LO MEJOR
Reviews.Author: Alvis Ramirez
Reviews.Content: HASTA AHORA NO TENGO NINGUN COMENTARIO NEGATIVO PARA ESTE TELEFONO, ES MI PRIMER TELEFONO INTELIGENTE. POR EL PRECIO QUE PAGUE, ESPERABA MAS ACESORIOS (MEMORIA, FORRO, CARGADOR VIAJERO ETC.)LO RECOMIENDO

Reviews.Title: very good in all aspects
Reviews.Author: Barone
Reviews.Content: very good in all aspects. I really recommend this product. Cheap and high quality product.It takes only a few days to arrive;

Reviews.Title: Good product, just what I expected
Reviews.Author: Diego Rodriguez "Diego R."
Reviews.Content: I bought it for basic needs, the most important was my e-mail. I didn't have a 24/7 way of receiving my e-mails and this cheap cellphone does the work! It also has the benefits of BBM, MSN Messenger and WhatsApp!I have unlimited data plan with my provider and even though the speed is not great for tethering (I wouldn't use it for tethering, ever) it works for the cellphone usage itself perfectly.Sometimes is gets slow, a reboot will fix it and clear the memory. There are also many ways to optimize it.Recommended

Reviews.Title: NO GPS!
Reviews.Author: BeccaLynn "BeccaLynn"
Reviews.Content: I really like this phone and have been using it for several months now with no problems.  Be aware that this model does not have gps capabilities .  I miss that feature because I like using google maps for directions.

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Unlocked GSM Quad-Band: GSM 850/900/1800/1900 and GPRS/EDGE data capabilities.
2.0MP Digital Camera, High-resolution display with 320 x 240 65.000 colors TFT and 2.46 inches, 35 key backlit QWERTY keyboard, Trackpad Navigation, Intuitive icons and menus, Bluetooth enabled with Stereo Profile (A2DP).
Hot swappable microSD card; GPS capabilities; Email and Text; Instant Messaging; Social Networking; Multimedia Player; Wi-Fi enabled; Integrated Hands-Free Speakerphone; Video Camera Capabilities.
Talk time up to 5 hours - Standby up to 17 days.
